Title: Takamiya Nasuno Desu!: Teekyuu Spin-off
Description: ['A spin-off from Teekyuu which centers on the daily life of Nasuno Takamiya, the "exceedingly airheaded" school tennis club member in Teekyuu, and her friends.']
Related: ['Parent story: Pokemon', 'Prequel: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi', 'Sequel: Pokemon: Pikachu no Fuyuyasumi (2001)']
